SELECT r.id , r.reviewTitle , r.reviewContent , r.reviewStar , r.reviewLike , r.reviewDate , u.nickname AS userNickname , r.userId FROM spot_review_tbl r JOIN user_tbl u ON r.userId = u.id WHERE r.spotId = #{spotId} ORDER BY r.reviewDate DESC
